description: Are you one of us? This is the genuine article. From the very beginning (1868, to be exact), we knew Tabasco Sauce was more than just heat. That's because, unlike other sauces that mask the flavor of food, Tabasco Original Red blends with every bite - allowing our aged red peppers to amplify each flavor so you taste more of your favorite foods. So whether you shake a little or splash a lot, you're ready to turn ordinary meals into extraordinary ones. Taste the difference Tabasco can make on pizza, eggs, seafood, salad dressing and more. Hungry for more? Visit Tabasco.com to purchase any of our pepper sauce family of flavors. Shake some on and make your pizza supreme. Dress up the dressing. Crack open the flavor.                                                                         Shake well.
title: McIlhenny.Co Tabasco® Pepper Sauce - 5oz

bullets: Aged red peppers amplify each flavor so you taste more of your favorite foods.
Ready to turn ordinary meals into extraordinary ones.

description: With a bottle of Taco Bell Hot Sauce in your pantry or kitchen, your days of hoarding leftover packets are over. One bottle fits the sauce contents of 35 packets, which makes this way more convenient than the grab-and-stash method you've come to rely on — and it's ready for whenever you're hankering for a hit of hot sauce. Whether you're cooking Taco Bell-style tacos at home or you want to bring the signature zing to your other favorite foods, this hot sauce bottle gives you the heat you crave in a size you'll love.
title: Taco Bell Hot Taco Sauce 7.5oz

bullets: 7.5oz bottle of Taco Bell's signature Hot Sauce

description: The perfect hot sauce. One drop does it. Louisiana Hot Sauce is perfect for spicing up foods, sauces and drinks. Use it in your favorite recipes to enhance the flavor of meats, eggs and seafood. It's also excellent when used as a condiment right at the table, or dashed into a Bloody Mary for that extra zing. A few drops of Louisiana Hot Sauce will give your taco mucho macho, and sprinkled on your on your pizza gives it real pizzaz. For a rib-tickling treat, try the following recipe for delicious Bayou Beef Ribs. And for a special treat, Louisiana Popcorn. To your popcorn butter add two generous dashed of Louisiana Hot Sauce. Makes popcorn taste freshly done even when cold. All natural ingredients. Product of USA.
title: Louisiana The Perfect Hot Sauce - 12oz
